response.answer_text: In my opinion, the aggressiveness, the desire to be the best, and the ability to go from a broke nobody to a rich somebody. You don't hear of rock bands, country singers, and gospel singers going at each other's necks on wax nor singing about ambitious endeavors. Rap, unlike other music genres, is a genre where the artist and fan can be themselves and gain respect for it. Rap, like its parent lifestyle hip hop, is unlike any other genre of music. And while our grandparents may hate it, rap will only become more unique as other cultures around the world add their own ingredients to the rap hot pot.

Rap is unique because you know that good rappers have a sense of timing. LE from the K-pop group EXID is considered as one of the best rappers in Korea, her sense of timing is on point with a steady tempo. Rappers have literal timers in their heads to time every word out, and that’s why rappers are unique.
